author: asankha
msg: Axis2 has a strange behaviour where some of the headers returned from getEnvelope().getHeader().examineAllHeaderBlocks() returns raw OMElements and not only SOAPHeaderBlock's - make our code resilient

author: xavier
msg: add publish-latest target to ease snapshot publishing

author: asankha
msg: Axis2 has a strange behaviour where some of the headers returned from getEnvelope().getHeader().examineAllHeaderBlocks() returns raw OMElements and not only SOAPHeaderBlock's - make our code resilient

author: asankha
msg: Fix issues with fault handling, and allow propagation of actual cause to Synapse. Also allow Synapse to send back a fault message through a new MC property named RESPONSE to convert a messages' direction after the changes to the fault mediator
